scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run generate-docs && npm run postbuild
scripts.generate-docs: npm run assert-base-docs && npm run post-process
scripts.link:local:
npm run build && npm link && echo '
✅ Package linked locally! Use with:' && echo 'genesys-spark-mcp-server' && echo '
Unlink with: npm unlink -g genesys-spark-mcp-server'
scripts.post-process: npm run add-version-metadata && npm run enhance-component-metadata
scripts.publish:local:
npm run build && npm pack && echo '
✅ Local package created! Install with:' && echo 'npm install -g ./genesys-spark-mcp-server-*.tgz' && echo '
Clean up with: npm run clean:pack'
scripts.test.ci: npm run build && npm run tsc && npm run test
